summary: Find Grandmaster Elys for training.  She will train you in any skill at any level to any level.  Created with the Skrim -Community- Uncapper mod in mind for levels over 90, this mod will work with vanilla Skyrim and does not require SKSE or the uncapper mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=yellow]Grandmaster Elys has come to Skyrim[/color][/size][/center]
[center][size=3]"Lust your life is. Lost your life is." *[/size][/center]


[size=1]* Though She will make an exception for you. You will survive an encounter.[/size]
Grandmaster Elys travels throughout Skyrim, staying at Inns a couple to several days at a time.
When you find Her, you can ask Her to train you in any skill.

As long as you have the gold...

She is not inexpensive. Nor does She take just your gold. Nor will She train you for as long as you want.
She may decide She's had enough and simply disappear on you. Then you'll have to find Her again.

She is Succubi.

She takes a 3rd of your current health, magicka, and stamina each time She trains you.
She also takes some (or all) of your regeneration powers. (Make sure you have lots of potions if you decide you want to go adventuring right after training.)


Big thanks to Elys for letting me use her name for this mod.

There will undoubtedly be a few glitches here and there. I've tried to be thorough in testing, but... you know how it goes.

This mod does NOT require SKSE or the Skyrim -Community- Uncapper mod, though it was created with them in mind and they are recommended. This release will work perfectly fine with vanilla Skrim as well.

Requires Skyrim 1.8.151, earlier versions not supported.

Nuts and bolts:
This is an open ended quest that adds a journal entry so that you may toggle the quest marker to find Grandmaster Elys.
She randomly chooses one of the 16 inns of Skyrim to stay at for 2 to 6 days.
She will randomly choose to train you X number of times (up to six) before vanishing and going to another inn.
Training cost 2500 gold per level up to level 50. After that, cost is Level X Level.

In addition, not only does training take time, but each training session also reduces your regeneration of health, magicka, and staimina.
(Wearing enchanted items are not affected in Stages 1-4.) You are fatigued for the amount of training time it takes. See below.

Stage 1, 2 hours training game-time - 25% for 6 real-time minutes.
Stage 2, 4 hours training game-time - 50% for 12 real-time minutes.
Stage 3, 8 hours training game-time - 75% for 24 real-time minutes.
Stage 4, 12 hours training game-time - 100% for 36 real-time minutes.
Stage 5, 16 hours training game-time - 125% for 48 real-time minutes.
Stage 6, 24 hours training game-time - 150% for 72 real-time minutes.
(1 minute of real-time equals 20 minutes of game-time at the default timescale.)
author: Aellis

files.name: Universal Trainer GrandMaster Elys
files.changelogHtml:
Added additional dialog.
Rewrote most scripts and remove SMEN to prevent conflicts with other mods.
Changed penalty effects to real time (approximate game-time equivalents, see readme).
Fixed AI package data. She will now properly move from Inn to Inn.
Added Stage 6 Fatique if / when she disappears after training you.
